alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 20 at 12:28PM MDT until March 21 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow with patchy blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Southeast Johnson County and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions developing late tonight. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility could be reduced to under a half mile in heavier
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County
